participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Motivated and energetic, always looking to inspire others to lead healthier lives.
participant_1.background: my parents were both very athletic. i'm a clean eater. i love running and preparing for marathons. i got a new job just yesterday to be a life coach.

participant_2.name: Luna
participant_2.personality: Imaginative and whimsical, always dreaming up new adventures in her cloud world.
participant_2.background: i'm a little girl. i'm very lonely. i have superpowers. i live in the cloud. i like to make time stop.
